document_data.name: Poh Nih
document_data.mainbody: '''Poh Nih''' was a sage in [[T'u Lung]].
document_data.History:
Poh Nih was a sage and a member of the [[Black Leopard Cult]].

At one point, he fought [[drow]] in [[Shaddath Gap]] together with followers of [[Sel√ªne]].

In {{Yearlink|-830}}, he was slain when [[Shou Lung]] forces under General [[Wo Can]] took [[H'sin-to]]. He was buried according to the Black Leopard Cult's ceremonies and his tomb was guarded by a [[stone spirit]].
